long_description: The MTI RK5 CO2 Re-Arming Kit is a replacement cartridge for the MTI Helios Inflatable PFD. Features a Leland 24g CO2 cylinder with a Halkey-Roberts V86140 bayonet assembly. MTI RK5 CO2 Re-Arming Kit is easy to install and includes all required components to re-arm a PFD after it has been fired. MTI recommends that you inspect your PFD annually, and that the indicator window shows GREEN before use on the water. Compatible with the MTI Helios Inflatable PFD (sold separately), MTI Zephyr (not available) and MTI Bluestorm Sport 24 (not available).
short_description: The MTI RK5 CO2 Re-Arming Kit is a replacement cartridge for the MTI Helios Inflatable PFD.
